title: Online Project-Based Social Studies Education Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment for executing socially applicable projects in real-world contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three individual and team collaboration strategies for designing PBL projects in online environments.
Learners can produce effective social education content in limited technological environments (primarily smartphone-based).
Learners can complete team-based social science project deliverables applicable to real job contexts within six months.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
